leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-DFT 生态（输入/求解/后处理）
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 结构生成→DFT→后处理→高通量→验证

tools.name: nablaDFT
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale benchmark and dataset for conformational energy and Hamiltonian prediction
tools.detailed_description: nablaDFT provides a comprehensive benchmark suite and dataset designed for evaluating machine learning potentials and electronic structure methods. It focuses on conformational energy and Hamiltonian prediction, facilitating the development of accurate ML models for materials science.

tools.name: CASTEPconv
tools.one_line_profile: Automation tool for convergence testing in CASTEP calculations
tools.detailed_description: CASTEPconv is a Python tool designed to automate the process of convergence testing for CASTEP plane-wave DFT calculations. It helps users systematically determine optimal cutoff energies and k-point grids to ensure numerical accuracy.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-espresso
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen extension for parsing Quantum ESPRESSO input/output
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for pymatgen that provides enhanced capabilities for parsing and generating input/output files for the Quantum ESPRESSO DFT code, facilitating integration into Python-based materials workflows.

tools.name: atomate2-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: LAMMPS workflows for atomate2
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for the atomate2 workflow engine that implements workflows for running molecular dynamics simulations using LAMMPS. It enables high-throughput MD calculations within the atomate2 ecosystem.

tools.name: EquationsOfStateOfSolids.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for fitting equations of state for solids
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library dedicated to fitting various equation of state (EOS) models (e.g., Birch-Murnaghan) to energy-volume data from materials simulations, aiding in thermodynamic analysis.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for materials deep learning with RDKit and Pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: NFP provides Keras layers and utilities for building end-to-end deep learning models for molecules and crystals. It integrates with RDKit and Pymatgen to facilitate graph neural network construction for materials property prediction.

tools.name: ShakeNBreak
tools.one_line_profile: Defect structure-searching using chemically-guided bond distortions
tools.detailed_description: ShakeNBreak is a tool for identifying the ground-state structures of point defects in solids. It employs chemically-guided bond distortions to escape local minima during structural relaxation, ensuring accurate defect property predictions.

tools.name: doped
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for generation, processing, and analysis of defect supercell calculations
tools.detailed_description: doped is a comprehensive Python package for managing point defect simulations in solids. It handles the generation of defect structures, parsing of calculation results, and thermodynamic analysis (formation energies, transition levels) in a reproducible manner.

tools.name: surfaxe
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating and analyzing surface slabs for first-principles calculations
tools.detailed_description: Surfaxe is a Python library designed to automate the generation of surface slab structures from bulk crystals for DFT calculations. It also includes utilities for analyzing surface properties and classifying slab terminations.

tools.name: mcp-atomictoolkit
tools.one_line_profile: MCP server interface for atomistic simulations via ASE and Pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Model Context Protocol (MCP) that provides an interface for AI agents to perform atomistic simulations and data manipulations using standard materials science libraries like ASE and Pymatgen.

tools.name: PseudoDojo
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for generating and validating pseudopotentials
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed for the generation, validation, and management of pseudopotentials for density functional theory (DFT) calculations, supporting multiple formats and codes.

tools.name: aiida-cusp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for VASP with Custodian error handling
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the VASP DFT code, incorporating Custodian for automated error handling and recovery during calculations.

tools.name: acwf-verification-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for AiiDA common workflows verification
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts and tools used for the verification and benchmarking of density functional theory codes within the AiiDA Common Workflows (ACWF) project, focusing on equation of state and precision.

tools.name: aiida-common-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Common workflow interfaces for materials science codes
tools.detailed_description: A package implementing common interfaces for running workflows across different quantum engines (DFT codes) using AiiDA, facilitating cross-code comparison and interoperability.

tools.name: aiida-sssp-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for SSSP pseudopotential verification
tools.detailed_description: AiiDA workflows designed for the verification and precision testing of pseudopotentials as part of the Standard Solid State Pseudopotentials (SSSP) library project.

tools.name: refdata
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark data for DFT method development
tools.detailed_description: A collection of reference data and benchmarks specifically designed for the development, validation, and testing of density functional theory (DFT) methods and functionals.

tools.name: DFTAtom
tools.one_line_profile: Real-space DFT solver for atoms
tools.detailed_description: A C++ code for performing Density Functional Theory calculations on atoms using real-space methods, supporting LDA and LSDA functionals.

tools.name: JARVIS-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Software package for data-driven atomistic materials design
tools.detailed_description: An open-source software package that provides tools for atomistic materials design, including scripts for running DFT calculations, analyzing results, and applying machine learning models, associated with the JARVIS database.

tools.name: beautiful-atoms
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality atomistic rendering using Blender
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that interfaces with Blender to create high-quality, publication-ready 3D renderings of atoms, molecules, and crystal structures.

tools.name: CADET-Verification
tools.one_line_profile: Verification suite for CADET simulation engine
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive test suite for verifying the accuracy and convergence of the CADET (Chromatography Analysis and Design Toolkit) simulation engine, including order-of-convergence tests and high-precision reference solutions.

tools.name: ase-notebook
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization for ASE/Pymatgen in Jupyter
tools.detailed_description: A tool for creating highly configurable 2D (SVG) and 3D (Three.js) visualizations of atomic structures from ASE or Pymatgen objects directly within Jupyter Notebooks.

tools.name: PStudio
tools.one_line_profile: Pseudopotential Studio for generating and analyzing pseudopotentials
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter Notebook based tool (Pseudopotential Studio) for generating, testing, and analyzing pseudopotentials used in electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: DFT-FE
tools.one_line_profile: Real-space DFT calculations using Finite Elements
tools.detailed_description: A massively parallel real-space Density Functional Theory (DFT) code that uses the Finite Element method for accurate and scalable electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: bandstructureplots
tools.one_line_profile: Band structure plotting tool using pymatgen with atomic/orbital contributions
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for generating band structure plots from VASP calculations using pymatgen. It allows for visualizing atomic or orbital contributions using an RGB color scale, enhancing the interpretation of electronic structure data.

tools.name: atomate
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management software for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: Atomate is a library of pre-built workflows for computational materials science, working with FireWorks and pymatgen. It automates the execution and analysis of VASP and other calculations.

tools.name: maptools
tools.one_line_profile: Materials simulation data processing toolkit based on Pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: An open-source program for processing materials simulation data, built upon the Pymatgen library. It provides utilities for handling crystal structures and simulation outputs.

tools.name: delfta
tools.one_line_profile: Delta-QML deep learning model for medicinal chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool implementing Delta-Quantum Machine Learning (Delta-QML) for predicting properties in medicinal chemistry. It leverages quantum chemical data to improve prediction accuracy.

tools.name: vaspup2.0
tools.one_line_profile: VASP convergence testing tool for energy and dielectric constants
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based tool for automating convergence testing of VASP calculations, specifically focusing on energy cutoff and k-point density for energy and dielectric constant calculations.

tools.name: JARVIS-FF
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite and data for interatomic potential evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing data and scripts for the evaluation of interatomic potentials (force-fields) used in molecular dynamics, part of the JARVIS ecosystem. It supports benchmarking against DFT data.

tools.name: structuregraph-helpers
tools.one_line_profile: Helper functions for working with pymatgen structure graphs
tools.detailed_description: A collection of helper utilities for manipulating and analyzing structure graphs generated by pymatgen, facilitating graph-based materials analysis.

tools.name: perovskites-distortions
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools for hybrid organic-inorganic perovskite structures
tools.detailed_description: A collection of functions to manipulate and analyze the structural distortions of hybrid organic-inorganic perovskites, developed by LCBC-EPFL.

tools.name: construction_zone
tools.one_line_profile: Generators for nanoscale atomic scenes for S/TEM simulation
tools.detailed_description: Modules for generating nanoscale atomic structures and scenes, primarily using pymatgen, designed to prepare inputs for Scanning/Transmission Electron Microscopy (S/TEM) image simulations.

tools.name: matscipy
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic-scale materials science library for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for materials science at the atomic scale, providing tools for structure manipulation, analysis, and interfacing with various simulation codes.

tools.name: MPWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Custom workflow logic for the Materials Project
tools.detailed_description: The codebase defining the custom workflows used by the Materials Project, merging pymatgen, custodian, and FireWorks to manage high-throughput materials calculations.

tools.name: atomate2
tools.one_line_profile: Next-generation workflow library for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: The successor to atomate, providing a library of computational materials science workflows designed to be more flexible and easier to use, supporting various DFT codes.

tools.name: custodian
tools.one_line_profile: Just-in-time job management and error recovery framework
tools.detailed_description: A simple, robust, and flexible just-in-time job management framework in Python. It is widely used in materials science to manage VASP jobs, handle errors, and ensure convergence.

tools.name: mpmorph
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to run and analyze ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations, typically run with VASP. It integrates with the Materials Project ecosystem.

tools.name: pymatgen
tools.one_line_profile: Robust materials analysis code for structure and electronic structure
tools.detailed_description: Python Materials Genomics (pymatgen) is a core library for materials analysis, defining classes for structures and molecules, and supporting input/output for many electronic structure codes like VASP.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-alloys
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen add-on for alloy system analysis
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for pymatgen containing classes and tools specifically designed for describing and analyzing alloy systems.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-defects
tools.one_line_profile: Defect analysis modules for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A specialized add-on for pymatgen focusing on the analysis of point defects in materials, including formation energy calculations and thermodynamic analysis.

tools.name: pymatgen-db
tools.one_line_profile: Database management tool for Materials Project style databases
tools.detailed_description: An addon to pymatgen that facilitates the creation and management of MongoDB databases for materials data, following the Materials Project schema.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-validation
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive input/output validator for VASP calculations
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to validate VASP calculation inputs and outputs to ensure compatibility with Materials Project data standards and general correctness.

tools.name: mlearn
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark Suite for Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate the performance of machine learning interatomic potentials for materials, providing datasets and evaluation metrics.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion analysis tools for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: An add-on to pymatgen that provides tools for analyzing diffusion in materials, including molecular dynamics trajectory analysis and nudged elastic band (NEB) analysis.

tools.name: automag
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow for identifying stable magnetic configurations in crystal structures
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to automatically search for the most energetically stable magnetic state of a given material structure, facilitating magnetic ground state determination in DFT workflows.

tools.name: mispr
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow infrastructure for materials science simulations
tools.detailed_description: A software package for automating materials science computations, particularly focusing on density functional theory (DFT) and molecular dynamics (MD) workflows.

tools.name: DeltaCodesDFT
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark scripts for calculating the Delta factor of DFT codes
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts used to generate the Delta factor, a benchmark metric for assessing the accuracy and reproducibility of solid-state Density Functional Theory (DFT) codes against reference all-electron results.

tools.name: pysktb
tools.one_line_profile: Solver for Slater-Koster tight-binding Hamiltonians
tools.detailed_description: A scientific Python package designed to solve Slater-Koster tight-binding topological Hamiltonians, useful for electronic structure calculations in condensed matter physics.

tools.name: gpaw-tools
tools.one_line_profile: GUI and CLI interface for GPAW DFT calculations
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly interface (GUI and CLI) for conducting Density Functional Theory (DFT) and molecular dynamics (MD) calculations using the GPAW code, simplifying input generation and analysis.

tools.name: JARVIS-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive toolkit for data-driven atomistic materials design
tools.detailed_description: An open-source software package for data-driven atomistic materials design, providing tools for high-throughput DFT calculations, machine learning force fields, and materials database management.

tools.name: MAST
tools.one_line_profile: Materials Simulation Toolkit for automating DFT workflows
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to manage and automate computational materials science workflows, particularly for density functional theory calculations using pymatgen.

tools.name: MAST-ML
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning pipeline for materials science
tools.detailed_description: MAterials Simulation Toolkit for Machine Learning (MAST-ML) is a comprehensive pipeline for performing data-driven analysis and machine learning modeling in materials science.

tools.name: ternary-diagram
tools.one_line_profile: Library for plotting ternary phase diagrams
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to easily draw and customize ternary diagrams (phase diagrams) for materials science applications, offering an alternative to heavier frameworks.
